data.name: XScrollBar
desc: gives access to the value and settings of a scroll bar and makes it possible to register adjustment event listeners.

methods.name: getBlockIncrement
desc: returns the currently set increment for a block move.

methods.name: getLineIncrement
desc: returns the currently set increment for a single line move.

methods.name: getMaximum
desc: returns the currently set maximum scroll value of the scroll bar.

methods.name: getOrientation
desc: returns the currently set ScrollBarOrientation of the scroll bar.

methods.name: getValue
desc: returns the current scroll value of the scroll bar.

methods.name: getVisibleSize
desc: returns the currently visible size of the scroll bar.

methods.name: setBlockIncrement
desc: sets the increment for a block move.

methods.name: setLineIncrement
desc: sets the increment for a single line move.

methods.name: setMaximum
desc: sets the maximum scroll value of the scroll bar.

methods.name: setOrientation
desc: sets the ScrollBarOrientation of the scroll bar.

methods.name: setValue
desc: sets the scroll value of the scroll bar.

methods.name: setValues
desc: sets the scroll value, visible area and maximum scroll value of the scroll bar.

methods.name: setVisibleSize
desc: sets the visible size of the scroll bar.
